title: Fishing Trawler/Strategies

properties.name: description
properties.value: This method involves chopping the Enormous Tentacle (Fishing Trawler) and fixing the broken rail to get the 50 contribution points required to roll for a piece of the Angler's outfit.

content:
This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.

Contents

  • 1 General considerations
  • 2 Recommended equipment
    • 2.1 Weight-reducing equipment
  • 3 Specific methods

General considerations[edit | edit source]

  • This minigame is mostly only useful for obtaining the Angler Outfit.
  • When playing for the outfit, you only need 50 contribution points. It can be useful to bring something to do for the 3 minutes of AFK time, like darts or arrows to fletch.

Recommended equipment[edit | edit source]

  • An Axe if chopping the Kraken (one can be obtained from a box on the top deck)
  • A hammer if fixing broken railings (one can be obtained from a box on the top deck)
  • A bailing bucket if bailing water
  • Swamp paste if patching leaks

Weight-reducing equipment[edit | edit source]

  • A graceful cape/agility cape/max cape, a spottier cape or spotted cape, and/or penance gloves or graceful gloves can be useful to reduce your weight for players with lower agility levels. This is not required for the Kraken method.

Specific methods[edit | edit source]

This method involves chopping the Enormous Tentacle (Fishing Trawler) and fixing the broken rail to get the 50 contribution points required to roll for a piece of the Angler's outfit.

Game strategy[edit | edit source]

  1. When the round starts, run upstairs:
  2. Wait in the back of the boat.
  3. If needed, pick up an axe and hammer from the box on the top deck.
  4. Chop the Enormous Tentacle when it appears.
  • Note if it slaps once or twice.
  1. As soon as your character stops chopping, click under the tentacle to fix the Broken Rail.
  2. If the Tentacle slapped the boat twice, the Broken Rail will break again, allowing you to fix it again.
  3. Repeat this until your contribution meter is yellow, or you have 50 Contribution points.

This method maximises XP and fish caught. Having a full Contribution Meter also increases pet chance to 1/2500.

Game strategy[edit | edit source]

The simplest method for maximising points involves patching breaches in the hold of the ship. Each patch awards 5 reward points, up to a maximum of 255.

It takes 51 swamp paste to reach 255 points. No additional points are rewarded beyond 255.

{{incomplete}}
==General considerations==
* This minigame is mostly only useful for obtaining the Angler Outfit.
* When playing for the outfit, you only need 50 contribution points. It can be useful to bring something to do for the 3 minutes of AFK time, like darts or arrows to fletch.

==Recommended equipment==
* An [[Axe]] if chopping the Kraken (one can be obtained from a box on the top deck)
*A [[hammer]] if fixing broken railings (one can be obtained from a box on the top deck)
*A [[bailing bucket]] if bailing water
*[[Swamp paste]] if patching leaks

===Weight-reducing equipment===
*A [[graceful cape]]/[[agility cape]]/[[max cape]], a [[spottier cape]] or [[spotted cape]], and/or [[penance gloves]] or [[graceful gloves]] can be useful to reduce your weight for players with lower [[agility]] levels. This is not required for the Kraken method. 

==Specific methods==
<tabber>
Kraken (Angler Outfit)=
This method involves chopping the [[Enormous Tentacle (Fishing Trawler)]] and fixing the broken rail to get the 50 contribution points required to roll for a piece of the [[Angler's outfit]].

=== Game strategy ===
# When the round starts, run upstairs:
# Wait in the back of the boat.
# If needed, pick up an axe and hammer from the box on the top deck.
# Chop the Enormous Tentacle when it appears. 
* Note if it slaps once or twice.
# As soon as your character stops chopping, click under the tentacle to fix the Broken Rail.
# If the Tentacle slapped the boat twice, the Broken Rail will break again, allowing you to fix it again.
# Repeat this until your contribution meter is yellow, or you have 50 Contribution points.

|-|

Bailing and Patching (Fish/Pet)=
This method maximises XP and fish caught. Having a full Contribution Meter also increases pet chance to 1/2500.

=== Game strategy ===
The simplest method for maximising points involves patching breaches in the hold of the ship. Each patch awards 5 reward points, up to a maximum of 255. 
It takes 51 swamp paste to reach 255 points. No additional points are rewarded beyond 255.
</tabber>
